Name: Riddled Corpses
About the game: Riddled Corpses is a twin-stick shooter made in the style of 8/16 bit arcade games. Travel through diverse locations packed with danger and huge bosses. Choose your character wisely and make good use of their abilities and the special items (clock, dynamite and turrets) to progress and destroy the root of evil! - Fast-paced action - 2 player local coop - 6 characters with varying stats and abilities - Arcade and survival modes - Combo system - Quality chiptune music - Register your best scores on the online leaderboard! - Compatible with Xbox 360, Xbox One, PS3 and PS4 gamepads (with Ds4Tool)
